name: Waking Atlas
description:
For all of written history, it's been known that the great Titan Atlas holds the world upon his back.
However, every 20 years Atlas begins to fall asleep and a child must be sent to the bottom of the world
to wake him before he drops the earth.

This year...YOU HAVE BEEN CHOSEN.

FEATURES:
-3 Difficulty settings Including a permadeath mode!
-Animated enemies!
-Probably the best RPG story ever told, 4rel.
-In-Game Achievements!
-Below average review scores!
-Hint button in case you forget what you're supposed to be doing!
-Full color manual!
-Hours upon hours of retro game STANK.
-ROM file included in case you'd rather play this on your favorite GB emulator!
-Beginner friendly RPG gameplay!
